trans-unit.source: Provides data for mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para rato relacionados com os eventos que especificamente envolve os botões de rato ou a roda do rato, por exemplo encaminhados <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe de dados de eventos é utilizada com os seguintes eventos anexados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> This event data class is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>Esta classe de dados de eventos é utilizada com os seguintes eventos encaminhados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Estes eventos encaminhados reencaminhar os eventos anexados listados anteriormente para os tornar mais acessível para o modelo de elemento geral [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>Os eventos anexados e os eventos de elemento base encaminhado partilham os seus dados de evento e o bubbling e túnel versões dos eventos encaminhados também partilham dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode afetar as características processadas do evento que circula-lo a rota de evento.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Other than the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of MouseEventArgs that you might use in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> implementation are several properties that expose the current button state (such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A>) and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Other than o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>propriedades que são relevantes para todos os eventos encaminhados, as propriedades mais interessantes de MouseEventArgs que poderá utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>implementação são várias propriedades que expõem o estado atual do botão (tais como <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A>) e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> is useful particularly because you can check <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A> on it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>é útil particularmente porque pode verificar <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A>na mesma.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different event data class, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que os eventos que especificamente lidam com eventos de botão do rato utilizam uma classe de dados de eventos diferentes, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The mouse button properties are available on MouseEventArgs in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de botão do rato estão disponíveis no MouseEventArgs no caso de existirem modos de entrada ou de interações que envolvem os botões, mesmo que o processamento de um evento não botão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref> and timestamp
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref> e carimbo

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de rato associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hora quando a entrada ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>, timestamp, and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref>, timestamp, e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de rato associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hora quando a entrada ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The logical stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de caneta lógica associado este evento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the mouse pointer relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a posição do ponteiro do rato em relação ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The point (0,0) is the upper-left corner of the frame of reference.
trans-unit.target: O ponto (0,0) é o canto superior esquerdo da moldura de referência.

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can also be used to obtain the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: A estática <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método também pode ser utilizado para obter a posição do rato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para utilizar como a referência de moldura para calcular a posição do ponteiro do rato.

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinates of the mouse pointer position relative to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: A x-y-coordenadas dos e a posição de ponteiro do rato em relação ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Invoca processadores de eventos de uma forma de específicos do tipo, que pode aumentar a eficiência do sistema de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação casts o processador genérico como um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>e, em seguida, invoca o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre este padrão de implementação e as razões para o mesmo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>e [descrição geral de eventos encaminhados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: O processador genérico de chamada de uma forma de específicos do tipo.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: O destino de invocar o processador no.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do botão esquerdo do rato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the left mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual do botão esquerdo do rato, que é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the middle mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do botão do rato média.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the middle mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual do botão do rato média, que é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o dispositivo de rato associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de rato associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do botão direito do rato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the right mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual do botão direito do rato, que é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o dispositivo de caneta associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The stylus associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: A caneta associada a este evento.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the first extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do botão do rato expandida primeiro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the first extended mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual do primeiro botão do rato expandido, qual é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do botão do rato expandida segundo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the second extended mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual do botão do rato expandida segundo, que é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.
